interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Curly Hair Brush For Thick Hair.Kids Hair Brush Detangler.Unicorn Hair Brush Set.Protects Against Split Ends And Breakage For All Hair Types.For Women,Men,Wet And Dry Hair.
Review Date: 2021/07/19
Store: Duhpofc
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Duhpofc', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 3.58 x 1.77 inches; 5.08 Ounces'}
Review Text: This hairbrush set is perfect for my 3 year old daughter!  She loves mermaids and unicorns so was very excited to get this hairbrush.  The hairbrush works very well in her hair and easily detangles the hair. It is easy to hold and seems very well made.  The brush comes with coil hair ties. I have never used these before but they are just the right size for my daughter’s hair and they are great!  They hold the hair well and don’t damage it like rubber bands do.  There is also a small jar of butterfly clips which my daughter likes. These are not very well made as we already had one break but they are a nice bonus to this set. I definitely recommend for a younger child!
Review Title: Great for young child
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Headbands For Kids MINNIE Sequins Hair MOUSE Girls Baby EARS Bow knot (Red and Black) Toptree {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Toptree', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Item Form': 'Ribbon', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 3.58 x 0.94 inches; 0.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '710654129025'} So excited for my daughter to wear these for her first trip to Disney! 8months old and they look adorable on her! Fits great!

UPDATE - my daughter wore these to Disney World and we received SO many compliments on them. I actually prefer these for her age over the overpriced options at the park. Perfect for Disney trip! N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} I am typically low maintenance with make up but wanted to try this product as I live in the sweltering heat of south Florida year round. First thing I noticed is this is a very nice sized bottle, almost as big as a standard can of hairspray. I have been using this product for a week now and have definitely noticed a difference. My pores are less noticeable and my makeup lasts much longer than without the product. My face looks and feels smooth all day. It’s so easy to use too! All you have to do is shake it up and spray your face several times before applying makeup. I haven’t noticed a scent to it and barely notice the product at all when I spray it on. Now I just wish I had a travel size to take with me on upcoming trips! I definitely recommend giving this a try! Great product, face stays looking fresh all day 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Vedory ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} I work in a school that currently requires everyone to wear masks when on property. These mask brackets have really helped me feel more comfortable to wear a mask all day. I also find it much easier to speak and be heard with this bracket.

These are the second set of brackets I have tried and I feel like these fit my face much better than other ones. It took some getting used to as it doesn’t clip into my non pleated masks and sometimes moves around, but I am definitely liking using these better than nothing. I have shared extras with coworkers and they have all found them to be helpful. I would recommend. Helps when wearing mask all day Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories YanJie {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Package Dimensions': '10.12 x 7.6 x 1.22 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682099'} This headband is so cute! It fits my adult head and my 2 year old’s head well. It is extremely comfortable to wear and doesn’t dig into the sides of your head. The headband is covered in satin so it’s soft. It can fall down pretty easily because there are no combs to hold it in place but I’ll take that inconvenience for the comfort! It is decently made, not real high quality, but for the price it’s fair. Much cheaper than buying ones inside parks! I definitely recommend this! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** Primarily focused on children's products for young girls, particularly those that resonate with popular themes like mermaids and unicorns.
- **Shopping Preferences:** Values affordability and practicality while considering aesthetics and function. Shows a keen interest in items that promote comfort and appearance, particularly in beauty and self-care, and appreciates products that are easy for children to use.
- **Occasion-Focused:** Interested in special event products that enhance memorable experiences for her child and herself, balancing practicality with visual appeal during festive occasions.
- **Style Preference:** Seeks products that enhance a child’s appearance in a cute, thematic way, while also prioritizing beauty products that maintain a polished look for events.
- **Satisfaction Indicators:** Strong emphasis on product functionality, comfort, and effectiveness, with a recent focus on ease of use and supportive features. Accessories that are gentle on hair have become particularly important in her evaluations.
- **Social Engagement:** Appreciates products that garner positive attention, highlighting the value placed on social approval and shared experiences.
- **Purchase Timing:** Engages in seasonal and occasion-driven shopping, showing a proactive approach to family events and personal beauty routines, reflecting a commitment to delightful, cost-effective solutions for her child’s activities while prioritizing comfort and affordability for herself during festive moments.
